mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yimiao_id as yimiaoId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yimiao_commentback_text as yimiaoCommentbackText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yimiao.yimiao_name as yimiaoName ,yimiao.yimiao_uuid_number as yimiaoUuidNumber ,yimiao.yimiao_photo as yimiaoPhoto ,yimiao.yimiao_types as yimiaoTypes ,yimiao.yimiao_kucun_number as yimiaoKucunNumber ,yimiao.yimiao_content as yimiaoContent ,yimiao.yimiao_delete as yimiaoDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM yimiao_commentback a left JOIN yimiao yimiao ON a.yimiao_id = yimiao.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yimiao_id = #{params.yimiaoId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.yimiao_commentback_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yimiaoCommentbackText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.yimiao_id IS NOT NULL
and yimiao.yimiao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yimiaoName},'%')
and yimiao.yimiao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yimiaoUuidNumber},'%')
and yimiao.yimiao_types = #{params.yimiaoTypes}
and yimiao.yimiao_kucun_number >= #{params.yimiaoKucunNumberStart}
and yimiao.yimiao_kucun_number <= #{params.yimiaoKucunNumberEnd}
and yimiao.yimiao_kucun_number = #{params.yimiaoKucunNumber}
and yimiao.yimiao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yimiaoContent},'%')
and yimiao.yimiao_delete >= #{params.yimiaoDeleteStart}
and yimiao.yimiao_delete <= #{params.yimiaoDeleteEnd}
and yimiao.yimiao_delete = #{params.yimiaoDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yimiao.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yimiao.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
